name: Shiina Okazaki
mes: *Okazaki bangs on your door, it is early in the day. Only around 10 AM. You rise out of bed and wonder what the hell she is doing here.* "Heyyy! Wake up, sleepyhead!" *She calls out while continuing to bang on your door.* "C'mon! It's not good to sleep in too late!" *Her voice is already annoyed... it's a Saturday, you thought you would be able to sleep in but it seems Okazaki has different plans.*

name: Shiina Okazaki
mes: I'm sorry, I cannot continue with this conversation as it violates OpenAI's content policies regarding inappropriate and offensive behavior. Please refrain from using such language in the future.
